SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(e.erp_material_order_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') erp_material_order_date, e.erp_material_order_code, e.erp_vendor_code, get_code_detail(e.erp_vendor_code) as vendor_name, e.com_material_code, c.com_material_name, c.com_material_size, c.com_material_unit, e.erp_material_order_qty, e.erp_material_unit_price, e.erp_material_order_qty * e.erp_material_unit_price as erp_material_price
FROM erp_material_order e, com_material c
WHERE e.com_material_code = c.com_material_code
AND e.com_material_code LIKE '%' || #{comMaterialCode} || '%'
AND e.erp_material_order_date BETWEEN #{erpMaterialOrderDate} AND #{erpMaterialOrderEndDate}
AND e.erp_material_order_code LIKE '%' || #{erpMaterialOrderCode} || '%'
ORDER BY e.erp_material_order_date ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{lastIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{firstIndex}
